Fusion::FusionDemo

Public Member Functions

void Quit ()
 Quits the demo by setting m_Quit to true.

Detailed Description

A simplified form of the Fusion front-end.

This is the gui menu system that will be used untill the gameplay system (FusionEngine) is completed. When the FusionEngine is completed, it will (read - might) be a shared library (for ease of updating), so a seperate frontend will need to be created.
